title: Oru Kal Oru Kannadi Lyrics Siva Manasula Sakthi
stanzas:
<div>
<div>
Oru Kal Oru Kannadi Lyrics Siva Manasula Sakthi

Oru kal oru kannadi
udaiyaamal modhikondal
kadhal

oru sol sila mounangal
pesaamal pesikondaal
kadhal.

kangal rendil
kadhal vandhaal
kanneer mattum
thunaiyaagume.

Oru kal oru kannadi
udaiyaamal modhikondal
kadhal

oru sol sila mounangal
pesaamal pesikondaal
kadhal.

thimirukku maru peyar neethaane
thinam thinam unnaal irandhene
marandhida mattum marandhene

theeyana purindhum adi naane
thirumbavum unai thoda
vandhene
therindhe sugamaai erindhene

kadum vishathinai
eduthu kudithaalum
adi konja neram kalithe
uyir pogum.
indha kadhalile
udane uyir pogum

kadhal endraal penne
chithravathai thaane.

Oru kal oru kannadi
udaiyaamal modhikondal
kadhal

oru sol sila mounangal
pesaamal pesikondaal
kadhal.

un mugam paarthe
naan ezhuven
un kural kettaal
naan ariven
un nizhaludane
naan varuven.

punnagai seithaal
uyir vaazhven.
purakkanithaal naan
ennaaven.
penne engae naan poven.

un udhatukkul irukkum
oru vaarthai.
adhai sollivittaal
thodangum en vaazhkai
mounathathil irukkum
enna valigal

kadhal endraal mella
saadhal endru solla

Oru kal oru kannadi
udaiyaamal modhikondal
kadhal

oru sol sila mounangal
pesaamal pesikondaal
kadhal.

kangal rendil
kadhal vandhaal
kanneer mattum
thunaiyaagume.

Oru kal oru kannadi
udaiyaamal modhikondal
kadhal

oru sol sila mounangal
pesaamal pesikondaal
kadhal.
category: Song:Oru Kal Oru Kannadi - Siva Manasula Sakthi
